Uses of Package
quoridor

Classes in quoridor used by quoridor
AbstractMove
          Template class of Move Controls all movement here.
AIPlayer
          AI player class has MinMax algorithm and handles AI movement
AStarNode
          Node with G & F costs and parentPosition for A* Pathfinding
AStarPathfinding
          A* Pathfinding gets shortest path in either number of moves or moves.
Board
          Board class where both players and walls are stored.
Game
          Create different type of games such as Human-Human, Computer-Computer, Human-Computer and no display game for testing
Move
          Move interface for wall and player movements
PlayerTile
          Player tile consists of player number, wall count of player and goal row of player
Tile
          Tile of board consists of column and row.
Validator
          Validator class provided by LIC to test a given list of moves
WallTile
          Wall tile consists of top and right wall flags
